rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现怀孕期间吃鱼不会影响孩子的心脏健康《营养》杂志上发表的一项综合研究发现，孕妇在怀孕期间食用鱼类不会影响 11 岁时孩子的心血管健康，这对饮食对心脏健康产生长期影响的假设提出了挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Eating-fish-during-pregnancy-doesnt-shape-kids-heart-health-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Eating-fish-during-pregnancy-doesnt-shape-kids-heart-health-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=177abea2-3696-45fe-8cbc-0be74d483a04 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 22:13:00 -0400 Eating fish during pregnancy doesn't shape kids' heart health, study finds
研究揭示了妊娠期间寨卡病毒感染对眼部影响的重要见解《iScience》杂志上发表的一项开创性研究提出了关于妊娠期间寨卡病毒感染对眼部影响的重要见解，并为治疗干预提供了有希望的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Study-reveals-crucial-insights-into-the-eye-effects-of-Zika-virus-infection-during-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Study-reveals-crucial-insights-into-the-eye-effects-of-Zika-virus-infection-during-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5b7fac8-d417-4a1a-9ff9-f8ad41993549 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 22:07:52 -0400 Study reveals crucial insights into the ocular effects of Zika virus infection during pregnancy
通过可靠的血糖监测（无需刺破手指）彻底改变糖尿病管理研究引入了一种新型非侵入式血糖测量技术 DIROS，该技术通过关注血液丰富的皮肤区域来提高准确性，避免与间质液测量相关的常见陷阱，并为糖尿病管理提供一种有前途的工具https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Revolutionizing-diabetes-management-with-reliable-blood-glucose-monitoring-without-finger-pricking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Revolutionizing-diabetes-management-with-reliable-blood-glucose-monitoring-without-finger-pricking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=219612ec-1923-4c26-b3ba-c23e515d8a10 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 21:56:00 -0400 Revolutionizing diabetes management with reliable blood glucose monitoring without finger pricking
新型 DNA 纳米机器精准瞄准乳腺癌乳腺癌是女性最常见的恶性肿瘤，严重威胁女性健康。由于乳腺癌肿瘤间和肿瘤内的高度异质性，患者的临床治疗和预后可能存在很大差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/New-DNA-nanomachine-targets-breast-cancer-with- precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/New-DNA-nanomachine-targets-breast-cancer-with- precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fde2181d-20de-424c-93fa-8dedb9e47be7 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 21:46:27 -0400 New DNA nanomachine targets breast cancer with precision
科学家开发出一种针对阿尔茨海默病的 mRNA 技术方法弗洛里大学的科学家们开发了一种 mRNA 技术方法来靶向有毒蛋白 tau，这种蛋白在阿尔茨海默病和其他痴呆症患者体内积累。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Scientists-develop-an-mRNA-technology-approach-to-target-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Scientists-develop-an-mRNA-technology-approach-to-target-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aef8a7f2-6a64-4d3c-b4d6-58ae1b670c5a Thu, 28 Mar 2024 21:40:35 -0400 Scientists develop an mRNA technology approach to target Alzheimer’s disease
抗体的发现可以解释有关 COVID-19 和长期 COVID 的谜团UVA Health 研究人员发现了 COVID-19 和长期 COVID 的一些最令人费解的谜团的潜在解释。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Antibody-discovery-could-explain-mysteries-about-COVID-19-and-long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Antibody-discovery-could-explain-mysteries-about-COVID-19-and-long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=505770c6-ffd5-43f7-8339-c1fc45c94943 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 21:21:13 -0400 Antibody discovery could explain mysteries about COVID-19 and long COVID
研究人员发现了一种更安全、更有效的新药测试技术麦吉尔研究人员发现了一种更安全、更有效的技术来测试正在开发的新药。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Researchers-discover-a-safer-and-more-efficient-technique-for-testing-new-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Researchers-discover-a-safer-and-more-efficient-technique-for-testing-new-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98614ab3-46d1-4c55-b221-2fdb3c417646 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 21:09:50 -0400 Researchers discover a safer and more efficient technique for testing new drugs
研究显示，在心脏骤停事件中很少使用公共除颤器自动体外除颤器 (AED) 是公共建筑中的常见资源，但一项新的分析表明，它们很少用于帮助心脏骤停的患者进行复苏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Public-defibrillators-rarely-used-during-cardiac-arrest-incidents-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Public-defibrillators-rarely-used-during-cardiac-arrest-incidents-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16b3ad47-e62d-4f50-a012-160b56da0c2b Thu, 28 Mar 2024 20:58:42 -0400 Public defibrillators rarely used during cardiac arrest incidents, research shows
PROSPERITY 试验显示强化鸡蛋对胆固醇没有负面影响无论您喜欢单面鸡蛋、煮鸡蛋还是炒鸡蛋，许多人都会犹豫是否要吃鸡蛋，因为担心鸡蛋可能会提高胆固醇水平，对心脏健康不利。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/PROSPERITY-trial-reveals-no-negative-cholesterol-impact-from-fortified-eggs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/PROSPERITY-trial-reveals-no-negative-cholesterol-impact-from-fortified-eggs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f2f238f-0a0c-4b32-a434-2a45bc198338 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 20:46:49 -0400 PROSPERITY trial reveals no negative cholesterol impact from fortified eggs
心理健康状况可能会加速年轻和中年女性的心血管风险人们普遍认为年轻女性患心脏病的风险较低，但新的研究敦促临床医生重新审视这一假设，特别是对于患有某些心理健康问题的女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Mental-health-conditions-could-accelerate-cardiovian-risk-in-young-and-middle-ged-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240328/Mental-health-conditions-could-accelerate-cardiovian-risk-in-young-and-middle-ged-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f584c33b-c167-44e6-ad44-e1579f829d51 Thu, 28 Mar 2024 20:43:52 -0400 Mental health conditions could accelerate cardiovascular risk in young and middle-aged women
